name: 李鎮宇
objective:
Students taking this course will
- Learn the core concepts and key business models of e-commerce
- Gain knowledge of the payment, marketing, mobile, and other applications relevant to e-commerce
- Apply your learning into actual practice by analyzing cases and writing an e-commerce business plan, revising it through feedback from stakeholders.
schedule:
1. Class Introduction
2. E-commerce Business Strategies 
3. Startups—digital disruptors
4. Seminar
5. E-commerce Retail and Services
6. Online Media
7. Online Communities
8. Seminar
9. Exam Week
10. B2B E-commerce
11. E-commerce Marketing and Advertising
12. Seminar
13. Social, Mobile, and Local Marketing
14. E-commerce Infrastructure 
15. E-commerce Security and Payment Systems 
16. Seminar
17. Building an E-commerce Presence / Ethics
18. Exam Week

20% - E-Commerce Assignment 3
20% - E-Commerce Assignment 4
